name: dfs.client.socketcache.expiryMsec
description: Socket cache expiration for short-circuit reads in msec.

name: dfs.namenode.maintenance.replication.min
description: Minimal live block replication in existence of maintenance mode.

name: ipc.client.kill.max
description: Defines the maximum number of clients to disconnect in one go.

name: mapreduce.map.cpu.vcores
description:
The number of virtual cores to request from the scheduler for
  each map task.

name: dfs.namenode.lease-recheck-interval-ms
description:
During the release of lease a lock is hold that make any
    operations on the namenode stuck. In order to not block them during
    a too long duration we stop releasing lease after this max lock limit.

name: dfs.client.short.circuit.replica.stale.threshold.ms
description:
The maximum amount of time that we will consider a short-circuit replica to
    be valid, if there is no communication from the DataNode.  After this time
    has elapsed, we will re-fetch the short-circuit replica even if it is in
    the cache.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.retry.max.attempts
description:
Max retry to satisfy the block storage policy. After this retry block will be removed
    from the movement needed queue.

name: dfs.webhdfs.netty.high.watermark
description: High watermark configuration to Netty for Datanode WebHdfs.
